mainPage.title: Lightning cryptocurrency exchange
mainPage.hint: By using the site and creating an exchange, you agree to the FixedFloat's

pros.title: Trusted since 2018
pros.text1: Maximum exchange speed due to the full automation
pros.text2: Pick the right strategy and make favourable trades
pros.text3: Best exchange rates and minimum commissions

faq.title1: How can I track my order?
faq.text1: In three ways: by email (if you leave your email address), on our website (if your browser accepts cookies) or by viewing the transactions in the blockchain by the links from your order.
faq.text2: No registration and no need to share your personal details. We don't hold your funds, all exchanges take place instantly in fully automatic mode.
faq.text3: Honesty is our main priority, so we commit to full transparency and make all the fees clear:
faq.fix: 1% if you opt for a fixed rate
faq.float: 0.5% if you opt for a floating rate

popup.title: What is the difference between fixed and a float rates?

fix.1: Opting for a fixed rate, you get the price you see at the point of initiating a transaction.
fix.p3: If the market rate changes by more than 1.2% before the appearance of your transaction on the blockchain network, you will be asked to make a refund or continue exchanging at the market rate.
fix.att: Attention! Your transaction must be received within 10 minutes and the amount must exactly match the amount of the order. Otherwise, you will be prompted to make a refund or continue the exchange at the market rate.

float.title: Float rate
float.text: The exchange rate is finally set when your transaction receives the necessary number of blockchain network confirmations. If the market goes up, you will get more cryptocurrency, if down - less. All fair.
float.p2: The exchange will be made at the market rate, which is finally set within 10 minutes after your transaction receives the required number of confirmations in the blockchain network.
float.t1: you are exchanging 1 BTC for 28.37362388 ETH. With a
float.t2: rate, you will receive exactly 28.37362388 ETH. With a
float.t3: exchange rate, the amount of ETH can change both up and down. It depends on changes in the market rate.

details.p1: The exchange rate will be fixed after receiving

know.title: What do you need to know?
know.p1: Only 1 TRX blockchain confirmation is needed to complete the exchange
know.p2: The speed of confirmation of a Bitcoin transaction depends on the level of congestion of the Bitcoin blockchain network, read more in our article
know.p3: If the amount of the transaction you sent differs from the initial amount specified in the order with a float rate, the order will be automatically recalculated.
know.p4: If your transaction is received after the expiration of the order, but within 24 hours, then this transaction will be automatically displayed in the order. You will be able to continue the order yourself or make a refund.

email.title: Order status notifications
email.p: Enter your email if you want to receive notifications about changes in the status of this order
